ComicInfo.Summary:
The fateful finale of AHOY's mad genre-mashup features a showdown against the Martians in 1975 BCE! After this, the Bronze Age will never be the same. Plus, finally: some bloody disco dancing! And the usual assortment of text stories and features.
ContentsBronze Age Boogie: (It's Fun To Serve In the) Y.M.C.A.Final Battle: A Choose-Your-Own-Ending StoryThe Atlantic City Review of BooksFranklin vs. the SpidersRE: Your Submission To [Redacted] MagazineComix Tapes: A Crossword Puzzle
